query: Why is my bill so high this month?
aiResponse: Your consumption spiked by 15% due to increased AC usage during the unusually cold December. Your predicted bill for January is AED 845.50.
proactiveSuggestion: Check your energy usage history in the dashboard before submitting a complaint. Consider adjusting your AC temperature settings.

query: I want to check my current bill status
queryAr: أريد التحقق من حالة فاتورتي الحالية
aiResponse: Your current bill for December is AED 510.20, which is due on February 5th. Your predicted bill for January is AED 520.75.
aiResponseAr: فاتورتك الحالية لشهر ديسمبر هي 510.20 درهم، والتي تستحق في 5 فبراير. فاتورتك المتوقعة لشهر يناير هي 520.75 درهم

query: Report power outage in my area
aiResponse: We've detected a planned maintenance in Downtown Dubai today from 10:00-14:00. Service will resume automatically. No ticket needed.
proactiveSuggestion: Alert: Planned maintenance in your area. Ticket submission not necessary as service will restore automatically by 14:00.

query: How can I reduce my electricity consumption?
aiResponse: Based on your usage patterns, I recommend: 1) Set AC to 24°C instead of 22°C (saves ~15%), 2) Use energy-efficient LED bulbs, 3) Schedule high-power appliances during off-peak hours (after 18:00).
proactiveSuggestion: Your peak usage is between 14:00-18:00. Consider using DEWA's smart meter to track real-time consumption.
